title: [BUG] Skiasharp - Band effect
body:
**Description**

I have an image and simply try to display it, but I got some "band" effects... seems the colors are altered.
If you look at the image on the left, it is correctly displayed (It is a simple photo viewer), on the right with SkiaSharp.
I have tried with PNG & JPG, but it is the same issue. I join the sample image too.

If you have any idea to solve this issue, your welcome :-)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17200971/130828780-2697377c-a0a4-4d28-949d-056a07279593.png)

**Here is my code (very basic):**
**
ResultBitmap = SKBitmap.Decode(stream);

protected override void OnPaintSurface(SKPaintSurfaceEventArgs e)
{
    SKPaint paint = new SKPaint();
    surface.Canvas.DrawBitmap(ResultBitmap , rect, paint: paint);
}
**

And the sample image:
![dog](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17200971/130829309-30d0ef6e-1ba8-40e2-a69a-f795ea75139c.jpg)
